website_summaries.verdict: Reasonable price for a complete lacrosse stick with a soft mesh string pocket.
pros: Matches standards and rules for lacrosse sticks in amateur leagues
Lightweight alloy that provides long-lasting performance for beginners
Entry-level players like the feel of the mesh pocket for ball handling and catching, which helps the player develop the proper fundamentals
It’s a midfielder stick, so it provides some versatility
cons: May not stand up to physical stick play, as the stick will indent, so it’s better for amateur leagues

customer_reviews.title: Good stick
customer_reviews.text: Great low cost stick. I bought this just so I could practice with my teenage daughter. She has a much more expensive stick and it shows but this stick is just fine for casual use. The release when throwing is not nearly as precise as her stick but the overall feel is good.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great entry level stick
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stick to play with my 15 year son and the stick is great. I played some lacrosse as a teenager myself and am familiar with lacrosse gear. I would say this is a solid, quality stick best suited for those relatively new to the game and want a great entry level stick. For those more experienced, I am sure you already know where to go to get a more advanced lacrosse stick.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel  K

customer_reviews.title: Great stick
customer_reviews.text: This has turned out to be a really good stick for me. The only trouble I had was the shooting strings were poorly placed and I had a terrible time at first adjusting them. Finally, I just pulled them out completely and used a different set of strings in a different pattern and it works amazingly well.
customer_reviews.author: Kvetchus

customer_reviews.title: This stick is sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: This stick is sturdy and well made! I bought it as a gift for my son who has recently found an interest in Lacrosse and he couldn’t be happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shaft sucks
customer_reviews.text: It was good for about a week until it started getting dents whenever somebody stick checked me. I guess it’s good for lower league play where it is not as physical but this stick will not work in high school lacrosse.
customer_reviews.author: Llamamama

customer_reviews.title: Good feel for beginners
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted to get in to lacrosse with the family. No one here plays it so we were new to the equipment. For total beginners I'd as this is pretty good. Been playing for several month now and it's holding up better then the cheap multi stick sets we bought for the other kids. Will buy again if they start to get serious
customer_reviews.author: Kaleo Puaa

customer_reviews.title: Great Stick!
customer_reviews.text: I play lacrosse at a collegiate level and needed a new stick. I decided to check this one out, since it was cheap. STX has been good to me in the past, and I own a bunch of their gear. Well, this shipped to me in three days (regular shipping, too!). It shoots very well. It's very sturdy, too. Couldn't be happier!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY
customer_reviews.text: Great stick for this price. My girlfriend plays lacrosse and I play sometimes with my friends so O figured I should get a better stick than my $1 stick I found at the goodwill. Super happy, the stick is extremely lightweight and has the feel of a higher quality stick to it. I’ve been recommending to many people and have been very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This thing came quick. Product arrived in great condition with extra plastic on the handle. It looks like it is high quality. Paint is nice and doesn’t look cheap. I bought two of these because my high school daughter wanted to train for lacrosse. I’ll update the review after a few weeks of use. Thanks for getting this to us quickly. Just in time for summer training.
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: Casual leisure setup not game ready
customer_reviews.text: This is a great setup for a beginner, casual or leisure type use. I cannot see anyone using this during an actually game. Perfect for my needs to teach my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Win

customer_reviews.title: Sold as brand new but actually second-hand
customer_reviews.text: This was second-hand and had been used. Yet there was no mention of this when buying it. I believed it to be brand new. All the graphics were scuffed and worn away from use, and there was even grass in the net!
customer_reviews.author: mud

customer_reviews.title: He was very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: A gift for a grandson. He was very happy with it. He will use it this spring.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Kid

customer_reviews.title: Good Lacrosse Stick
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these lacrosse sticks and they are great for playing with my roommates. My only issue is that the two lacrosse sticks I bought came with slightly different pockets which is odd. The pockets are different between the two lacrosse sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhhh
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with the pocket, when I shoot it goes way too low. I’ve tried altering the shooting strings and still very low. I believe I will need to get it restrung.
customer_reviews.author: johnnyc3434

customer_reviews.title: The Real Deal STX stick Ready to Use
customer_reviews.text: This stick was used right out of the box in youth LAX clinic. Brand new. Not used. Don’t hesitate to buy it. Note all stick heads need occasional tightening.
customer_reviews.author: Public Teacher Man #87536

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for a solid lacrosse stick.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great deal. Would buy several more for the $30 I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: My son loves the set of two we purchased
customer_reviews.text: Great starter stick to get a player interested. Perfect for simple catch at the beach or backyard catch. I wouldn't recommend competition play. However, perfect for the casual enthusiast.
customer_reviews.author: S M

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, durable.
customer_reviews.text: After much research and going to sporting good stores. I decided to buy it from Amazon for 1/3 of the price from the sporting store. Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: sweetcandies

customer_reviews.title: Lacrosse perfect for the newbie
customer_reviews.text: Great product and sturdy. Lacrosse is getting more popular as time goes on and a great gift for one first starting out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lacrosse stick for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son, he wants to learn how to play lacrosse. The stick is a good length and is pretty sturdy. He is really excited to start using it.
customer_reviews.author: SGlick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect stick
customer_reviews.text: I bought for a gift. Son will be doing lacrosse this spring in school. Sturdy and perfect size plus light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t new when sent
customer_reviews.text: Luckily it wasn’t a gift or else I wouldn’t be too happy. It clearly wasn’t new, plenty of scratches on the head like its been gently used before being returned. But for the price and what it was bought for it’s fine.
customer_reviews.author: James Northrop

customer_reviews.title: It'll work and it's cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Good cheap stick for a beginner or a dad(like me) to throw with their son.
customer_reviews.author: Harold J. Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: this isint for defence
customer_reviews.text: this says in the description for defence a defence stick is like 5 feet to 6 feet long this is only for offence
customer_reviews.author: mommamiaa

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: We use this for a bunting practice for high school baseball
customer_reviews.author: Bill Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Great stick
customer_reviews.text: My 14 yr old son plays recreational Lacrosse and this stick is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Candace Grant

customer_reviews.title: Just what my boys wanted as beginners.
customer_reviews.text: The item is correct on the description. Arrived early and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: jbferrer70

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect stick for my 9 yr old. It's sturdy and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2. They are in fact lacrosse sticks. 5 stars. I got exactly what i wanted.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Good for starters but, Easily broken
customer_reviews.text: This stick is good for starters but, I used it once in a hs scrimmage and it got bent and now is not straight
customer_reviews.author: sweetienikki79

customer_reviews.title: NICE
customer_reviews.text: came on time, as was described. my son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: lesley

customer_reviews.title: Great brand and great price
customer_reviews.text: Stick came already put together and is setup great for beginners or the casual player.
customer_reviews.author: S.Rise

customer_reviews.title: Good for 8 year old
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old started lax this year and the stick has been perfect. Great color to tell him apart from the rest of the players.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany D.

customer_reviews.title: Men’s stick
customer_reviews.text: Men’s stick not women’s looked a bit cheap but good price
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner stick
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner stick, son started lacrosse this year and it had help to learn when
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Brown

customer_reviews.title: It’s a pretty good stick.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good stick but the mesh isn’t that good. It ripped after a month of being used. Also the shaft was dented from a check.
customer_reviews.author: SANJOY BISWAS

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner stick.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to play with my son without breaking the bank. Looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent experience shipping internationally
customer_reviews.text: Canadians wanting to play Lax in Germany, however finding sticks was really difficult. Shipping took 2 weeks less than expected and quality of the sticks and netting were really good!
customer_reviews.author: lashaunna

customer_reviews.title: Great stick
customer_reviews.text: Best value and the head is strung for beginner lacrosse players.
customer_reviews.author: jfernandez

customer_reviews.title: Good entry level stick
customer_reviews.text: Price was right. Good entry level stick. Mainly used to have a catch and practice with my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Gonzo17

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: As a former lacrosse player seeking a new stick to play around with, I was more than pleased with the quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Devin McIlvain

customer_reviews.title: Its really a great stick
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine and got me really into lacrosse i love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stick for my son and he loved it. I thought I’d give it a try and it is very well made. Will definitely be buying a few more in the near future!
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: He loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 12 year old grandson, he loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: STX Lacrosse Stallion 200 A/M Complete Stick
product_meta.description:
STX Stallion 200 Complete Stick 


 * Inspired by the elite Stallion U 500 head
 * Includes NEW STX 6000 series alloy handle featuring tonal "Memory Marker" graphics
 * Designed to help players develop proper fundamentals
 * Easy catching and ball control for all entry level players
 * Soft mesh stringing
 * Meets NCAA and NFHS rules
feature_bullets: The STX Stallion 200 boys complete stick is specifically designed to encourage the development of fundamental skills while drawing on the features of some of our advanced products.
Inspired by the elite STX men’s Stallion U550 head and includes soft mesh stringing
Complete stick only - includes new STX 6000 series alloy handle featuring tonal "memory marker" graphics
Easy catching and ball control for all entry-level boys players
